'''1.6.4 Build 11<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://twitter.com/Kulttuuri/status/441871988454596609|title=MinecraftEdu Development Build 11 is now live |date=March 7, 2014 |website=Twitter|author=}}</ref>'''<ref>{{Link|url=https://twitter.com/bb16923/status/444287074078711808|title=Historic marker (for us)!|website=Twitter|date=March 14, 2014}}</ref> is the eleventh build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released on March 7, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==

=== General ===

* Line wrap to MOTD and Welcome Message textareas.

== Changes ==

=== General ===

* Welcome message color changed to gold.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Exp bar was being shown even if some GUI was open.
* Students weren't able to click containers on top of disallow blocks.
* Both online and local mod lists didn't update if you deleted a mod when the Launcher was open. It still showed you had a mod installed even when you deleted it.
